{{Infobox Berry |name = Aguav |image = [[File:Aguav.png]] |caption = This Berry turns bitter toward the stem. The dainty flower it grows from doesn't absorb much sunlight. |growtime = 5m 50s |harvest = 17 berries |replant = 30% |points = 55 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *15 bitter *0 sour }} '''Aguav''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 25, but no more than 80 points of bitter and less than 5 points of all other flavours. The [[Rawst]] berry must be unlocked to obtain this berry. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Seed !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 0-40s || 40s - 2min 50s || 2min 50s - 3min 40s || 3min 40s - 5min 50s || 5min 50s - 11min 40s |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSeed.png|50px]] ||
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:AguavTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:AguavTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:AguavTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[Farm]] in following way to obtain Aguav berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] |- | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || || || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] |- | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] |} {{Berries}}
